00014       private string name;

00020 
00030       public UserMethod(IdEntry declaringType, String name, IdEntry returnType, IdEntry[] parameters, String[] parNames, MethodAttributes attributes)
00031       {
00032          this.declaringType = declaringType;
00033          this.name = name;
00034          this.returnType = returnType;
00035          this.attributes = attributes;
00036          this.parameters = new ParameterInfo[parameters.Length];
00037          this.parameterTypes = new Type[parameters.Length];
00038          this.symbolTable = new SymbolTable();
00039          this.symbolTable.OpenScope();
00040 
00041          bool isstatic = (attributes & MethodAttributes.Static) != 0;
00042          for (int i = 0; i < parameters.Length; i++ )
00043          {
00044             this.parameters[i] = new UserParameter(parameters[i], parNames[i], isstatic ? i : i + 1);
00045             this.parameterTypes[i] = this.parameters[i].ParameterType;
00046             IdEntry id = new IdEntry();
00047             id.ReflectionObject = this.parameters[i];
00048             this.symbolTable.Enter(parNames[i], id);
00049          }
00050       }

00129       public override MethodInfo GetBaseDefinition()
00130       {
00131          MethodInfo firstDeclared = this;
00132          Type baseType = ((Type)this.declaringType.ReflectionObject).BaseType;
00133          while (baseType != null)
00134          {
00135             MethodInfo temp = baseType.GetMethod(name, parameterTypes);
00136             if (temp != null)
00137             {
00138                firstDeclared = temp;
00139             }
00140             baseType = baseType.BaseType;
00141          }
00142          return firstDeclared;
00143       }
